titleStmt.title: The. V. abhominable blasphemies co[n]teined in the Masse with a short a[n]swere to them, that saie, we ronne before the kyng and his counsayle.
titleStmt.author: Véron, John, d. 1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Humfrey Powell, dwellyng aboue Holburne conduit,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Compiled by John Ueron, Senonois.
Running title reads: The. U. blasphemies conteined in the Masse.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
